milestones.title: EU-Payment Integration
milestones.description: Enabling real-time payments between consumers and service providers with European e-money (EURAU) from Germany

milestones.title: Fast-Track Onboarding
milestones.description: Easy onboarding of participants and employees via Fast Track Application with immutable registry v2 supporting Gaia-X identities and decentralized onboarding

milestones.title: Gaia-X Loire Integration
milestones.description: Issue Gaia-X Loire Participant Credentials for all participants, enable actor identification via Pontus-X registry according to de-facto standards, prepare SSI with OIDC

milestones.title: Ocean Enterprise RC1 Release
milestones.description: First Release Candidate of Ocean Enterprise with major framework upgrade for industry-grade data space integrations

milestones.title: Enterprise Participant Agent
milestones.description: Enable easy data space usage by organizations and employees without additional tools/wallets, with sovereign deployment support

milestones.title: Gaia-X & SSI Integration
milestones.description: Integrate SSI with OIDC4VP standard for credential exchange, enable Gaia-X based access controls, advanced ABAC, and prepare for EUDI integration

milestones.title: Ocean Enterprise Live
milestones.description: Launch production-ready Ocean Enterprise Framework with cross-domain data space support, real-time payment, and Gaia-X de-facto standards

milestones.title: New Dataspace Initiatives
milestones.description: Onboard new data space initiatives and 100+ users to the largest publicly available x-ecosystem with economic framework support

milestones.title: Compute-to-Data v2
milestones.description: Launch Compute-to-Data v2 with chained compute jobs, customized integrations, and advanced use case support on Ocean Enterprise foundation

milestones.title: EUDI and eIDAS 2.0
milestones.description: Full integration with EUDIW (European Digital Identity Wallet) and ELbW (Business Wallet) aligned with European Digital Identity Standards and eIDAS 2.0
